numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The headline is: The Never Ending Game Against Racism, but is the Game Even Fair?
2. The percentage of players of color is higher than the percentage of head coaches of color.
3. This difference is significant.
4. This difference is not only a lack of opportunity.
5. This difference is also a lack of ability for people of color to move up in industries.
6. Our society depends on these industries.
7. Leadership roles have earnings.
8. Coaching is a leadership role.
9. Player roles have earnings.
10. The earnings of leadership roles depend on more than talent.
11. The earnings of leadership roles depend on more than ability.
12. The earnings of leadership roles can depend on politics.
13. The earnings of leadership roles can depend on duplicity.
14. The number of players of color almost always outnumbers the number of coaches of color by a factor of 3.
15. I wonder why the number of players of color outnumbers the number of coaches of color by a factor of 3.
16. I wonder why this issue occurs.
17. People of color face obstacles in the sports industry.
18. These obstacles prevent people of color from achieving the same positions as white people.
19. We want to eliminate these obstacles.
20. This issue affects my community.
21. This issue has affected my community for 400 years.
22. I live in a predominantly white community.
23. This issue is present in my community.
24. The professional sports industry is a large platform.
25. If this issue occurs in the professional sports industry then this issue also occurs in smaller contexts.
26. The graph displays a discrepancy between the percentage of lead coaches of color and the percentage of players of color in major league sports.
27. The graph shows that the percentage of players of color is much higher than the percentage of coaches of color.
